relics.description: At the start of each combat, apply 1 Vulnerable to ALL enemies.
relics.flavorText: A once popular toy in the City. Useful for throwing enemies off balance.

relics.name: Bag of Preparation
relics.description: At the start of each combat, draw 2 additional cards.
relics.flavorText: Oversized adventurer's pack. Has many pockets and straps.

relics.name: Blank Card
relics.description: At the start of each combat, play a copy of a random card from your deck.
relics.flavorText: Card Mimic.

relics.name: Blood Vial
relics.description: At the start of each combat, heal 2 HP.
relics.flavorText: A vial containing the blood of a pure and elder vampire.

relics.name: Brass Tacks
relics.description: Start each combat with 2 Metallicize.
relics.flavorText: The luster on these tacks never seems to fade.

relics.name: Bronze Idol
relics.description:
Status cards now cost [E] and may be played for useful effects.

Slimed -> Lubricant: Draw 2 cards. Exhaust.
Wound -> Grievous Wound: Apply 1 Vulnerable.
Void -> Into the Void: Ethereal. Enemy loses 5 Strength this turn. Whenever this card is drawn, lose 1 Energy. Exhaust.
Dazed -> Daze: Ethereal. Apply 1 Weak. Exhaust.
Burn -> Ignite: Apply 10 :Soulburn. At the end of your turn, take 2 damage.
relics.flavorText: An ancient, weaponised antivirus - who knows who made it, and why?

relics.name: Bronze Scales
relics.description: Start each combat with 3 Thorns.
relics.flavorText: The sharp scales of the Guardian. Rearranges itself to protect its user.

relics.name: Centennial Puzzle
relics.description: The first time you lose HP each combat, draw 3 cards.
relics.flavorText: Upon solving the puzzle, you feel a powerful warmth in your chest.

relics.name: Ceramic Fish
relics.description: Whenever you add a card to your deck, gain 9 Gold.
relics.flavorText: Meticulously painted, these fish were revered to bring great fortune.

relics.name: Damaru
relics.description: At the start of your turn, gain 1 Mantra.
relics.flavorText: The sound of the small drum keeps your mind awake, revealing a path forward.

relics.name: Data Disk
relics.description: Start each combat with 1 Focus.
relics.flavorText: This disk contains precious data on birds and snakes.

relics.name: Defensive Thesis
relics.description: Defensive Stance's Finisher Bonus grants 5 more Block.
relics.flavorText: Pro tip: Don't get hit.

relics.name: Dolphin's Style Guide
relics.description: If you end your turn while in no Stance, draw 1 additional card next turn.
relics.flavorText: Author: Renowned explorer and pugilist Dolphin K. Mist.

relics.name: Dream Catcher
relics.description: Whenever you Rest, you may add a card into your deck.
relics.flavorText: The northern tribes would often use dream catchers at night, believing they led to self improvement.

relics.name: Fragmentation Grenade
relics.description: Damage dealt to random enemies is increased by 3.
relics.flavorText: Nobody dares to ask where the Gremlin got it from.

relics.name: Goop Dweller
relics.description: At the start of combat, slimeboundmod:Split into a slimeboundmod:Bruiser Slime.
relics.flavorText: He followed me home. Can I keep it?

relics.name: Happy Flower
relics.description: Every 3 turns, gain [E] .
relics.flavorText: This unceasingly joyous plant is a popular novelty item among nobles.

relics.name: Jar of TOBSCo
relics.description: Start each combat with 1 hexamod:Intensity.
relics.flavorText: A little extra heat makes everything better.

relics.name: Juzu Bracelet
relics.description: Normal enemy combats are no longer encountered in ? rooms.
relics.flavorText: A ward against the unknown.

relics.name: Lantern
relics.description: Start each combat with an additional [E] .
relics.flavorText: An eerie lantern which illuminates only for the wielder.

relics.name: Loaded Die
relics.description: Cards that choose random numbers have +1 minimum.
relics.flavorText: Cheese-stuffed.

relics.name: Maw Bank
relics.description: Whenever you climb a floor, gain 12 Gold. No longer works when you spend any Gold at a shop.
relics.flavorText: Surprisingly popular, despite maw attacks being a regular occurrence.

relics.name: Meal Ticket
relics.description: Whenever you enter a shop, heal 15 HP.
relics.flavorText: "Complimentary meatballs with every visit!"

relics.name: Nunchaku
relics.description: Every time you play 10 Attacks, gain [E] .
relics.flavorText: A good training tool. Improves the posture and agility of the wielder.

relics.name: Oddly Smooth Stone
relics.description: Start each combat with 1 Dexterity.
relics.flavorText: You have never seen something so smooth and pristine. This must be the work of the Ancients.

relics.name: Omamori
relics.description: Negate the next 2 Curses you obtain.
relics.flavorText: A common charm for staving off vile spirits. This one seems to possess a spark of divine energy.

relics.name: Orichalcum
relics.description: If you end your turn without Block, gain 6 Block.
relics.flavorText: A green tinted metal of an unknown origin. Seemingly indestructible.

relics.name: Pen Nib
relics.description: Every 10th Attack you play deals double damage.
relics.flavorText: Holding the nib, you can see everyone ever slain by a previous owner of the pen. A violent history.

relics.name: Pick of Rhapsody
relics.description: You can now Mine for 2 guardianmod:Gems at Rest Sites (up to 3 times).
relics.flavorText: With as many gemstones that litter the Spire, it is hard to imagine anyone so unlucky to have needed this Pick to aid them.

relics.name: Potion Belt
relics.description: Upon pickup, gain 2 Potion slots.
relics.flavorText: I can hold more Potions using this belt!

relics.name: Preserved Insect
relics.description: Enemies in Elite combats have 25% less HP.
relics.flavorText: The insect seems to create a shrinking aura that targets particularly large enemies.

relics.name: Protective Goggles
relics.description: If you end your turn with no Encoded cards, gain 4 Block.
relics.flavorText: Look closely.

relics.name: Red Skull
relics.description: While your HP is at or below 50%, you have 3 additional Strength.
relics.flavorText: A small skull covered in ornamental paint.

relics.name: Regal Pillow
relics.description: Whenever you Rest, heal an additional 15 HP.
relics.flavorText: Now you can get a proper night's rest.

relics.name: Rye Stalk
relics.description: At the end of your turn, ALL enemies lose HP equal to their hermit:Bruise.
relics.flavorText: Still in mint condition, despite being chewed on for so long.

relics.name: Seal of Approval
relics.description: Upon pickup, choose 1 of 3 Unidentified Character cards to add to your deck. All future Unidentified Character cards found will be of this character.
relics.flavorText: I'm The Ironclad and this is my favorite Relic in the Spire. -Merchant Advertising Pamphlet

relics.name: Silver Bullet
relics.description: Start each combat with an Encoded Piercing Shot.
relics.flavorText: Spirewolves are long gone.

relics.name: Smiling Mask
relics.description: The Merchant's card removal service now always costs 50 Gold.
relics.flavorText: Mask worn by the Merchant. He must have spares...

relics.name: Sneaky Teakwood Match
relics.description: At the start of each combat, hexamod:Ignite the current Ghostflame and hexamod:Advance.
relics.flavorText: Lights on any surface!

relics.name: Snecko Skull
relics.description: Whenever you apply Poison, apply an additional 1 Poison.
relics.flavorText: A snecko skull in pristine condition. Mysteriously clean and smooth, dirt and grime fall off inexplicably.

relics.name: Strawberry
relics.description: Upon pickup, raise your Max HP by 7.
relics.flavorText: "Delicious! Haven't seen any of these since the blight." - Ranwid

relics.name: Supply Scroll
relics.description:
At the start of your 3rd turn, gain a Supply Scroll.
Supply Scroll (0 [E] card): Gain a random assortment of 4 (6) Shivs and Wards. Exhaust.
relics.flavorText: A surprisingly detailed inventory of the mob's various bits and bobbles.

relics.name: The Boot
relics.description: Whenever you would deal 4 or less unblocked attack damage, increase it to 5.
relics.flavorText: When wound up, the boot grows larger in size.

relics.name: Tiny Chest
relics.description: Every 4th ? room is a Treasure room.
relics.flavorText: "A fine prototype." - The Architect

relics.name: Toy Ornithopter
relics.description: Whenever you use a potion, heal 5 HP.
relics.flavorText: "This little toy is the perfect companion for the lone adventurer!"

relics.name: Tricky's Bolster-Rod
relics.description: The first time you play a Power card each combat, gain 6 Block and 1 Strength.
relics.flavorText: Backed by the study of a thousand books. Knowledge is power!

relics.name: Vajra
relics.description: Start each combat with 1 Strength.
relics.flavorText: An ornamental relic given to warriors displaying glory in battle.

relics.name: War Paint
relics.description: Upon pickup, Upgrade 2 random Skills.
relics.flavorText: In the past, Ironclads would create wards using enchanted war paint before charging into battle.

relics.name: Whetstone
relics.description: Upon pickup, Upgrade 2 random Attacks.
relics.flavorText: "Flesh never beats steel." - Kublai the Great

relics.name: Wizard Hat
relics.description: Whenever you consume Wiz, remove a debuff at random.
relics.flavorText: The accompanying robes have long since been stolen.

relics.name: Arumba's Pocket Sentry
relics.description:
At the start of each turn, alternates between:
Deal 7 damage to a random enemy.
Apply 1 Weak to ALL enemies.
relics.flavorText: Sentry Mode active. Target acquired. No hard feelings.

relics.name: Blue Candle
relics.description:
Unplayable Curse cards can now be played.
Whenever you play a Curse, lose 1 HP and Exhaust it.
relics.flavorText: The flame ignites when shrouded in darkness.

relics.name: Bottled Flame
relics.description: Upon pickup, choose an Attack. Start each combat with this card in your hand.
relics.flavorText: Inside the bottle resides a flame that eternally burns.

relics.name: Bottled Lightning
relics.description: Upon pickup, choose a Skill. Start each combat with this card in your hand.
relics.flavorText: Peering into the swirling maelstrom, you see a part of yourself staring back.

relics.name: Bottled Tornado
relics.description: Upon pickup, choose a Power card. Start each combat with this card in your hand.
relics.flavorText: The bottle gently hums and whirs.

relics.name: Broken Tooth
relics.description: Whenever you beat an Elite encounter, gain 1 Strength at the start of each combat for the rest of the Act.
relics.flavorText: Appears too large to have come from a human jaw...

relics.name: Cable Spool
relics.description: Encode a copy of the first Encodable card you play each combat.
relics.flavorText: Tangled...

relics.name: Darkstone Periapt
relics.description: Whenever you obtain a Curse, increase your Max HP by 6.
relics.flavorText: The stone draws power from dark energy, converting it into vitality for the wearer.

relics.name: Deca's Washers
relics.description: At the start of each combat, draw 3 additional cards and add a Dazed into your draw pile.
relics.flavorText: It is unclear why Deca collects these.

relics.name: Duality
relics.description: Whenever you play an Attack, gain 1 temporary Dexterity.
relics.flavorText: "And the sun was extinguished forever, as if curtains fell before it." - Zoroth

relics.name: Eternal Feather
relics.description: For every 5 cards in your deck, heal 3 HP whenever you enter a Rest Site.
relics.flavorText: This feather appears to be completely indestructible. What bird does this possibly come from?

relics.name: Frozen Egg
relics.description: Whenever you add a Power card into your deck, Upgrade it.
relics.flavorText: The egg lies inert and frozen, never to hatch.

relics.name: Gelatinous Cube
relics.description: Whenever you draw a Status card, draw 1 card.
relics.flavorText: Hey, it stuck to your body.

relics.name: Gold-Plated Cables
relics.description: Your rightmost Orb triggers its passive an additional time.
relics.flavorText: "Interesting! Even automatons are affected by placebo." - Ranwid

relics.name: Gremlin Horn
relics.description: Whenever an enemy dies, gain [E] and draw 1 card.
relics.flavorText: "Gremlin Nobs are capable of growing until the day they die. Remarkable." - Ranwid

relics.name: Horn Cleat
relics.description: At the start of your 2nd turn, gain 14 Block.
relics.flavorText: Pleasant to hold in the hand. What was it for?

relics.name: Impeccable Pecs
relics.description:
Whenever you gain Strength, gain an equal amount of Temporary_HP.
Start each combat with 1 Strength.
relics.flavorText: Glorious.

relics.name: Ink Bottle
relics.description: Whenever you play 10 cards, draw 1 card.
relics.flavorText: Once exhausted, appears to refill itself in a different color.

relics.name: Jeremiah's Banner
relics.description: At the start of combat, slimeboundmod:Split into a slimeboundmod:Leeching Slime and gain 1 Slime slot.
relics.flavorText: You and ooze army.

relics.name: Kunai
relics.description: Every time you play 3 Attacks in a single turn, gain 1 Dexterity.
relics.flavorText: A blade favored by assassins for its lethality at range.

relics.name: Letter Opener
relics.description: Every time you play 3 Skills in a single turn, deal 5 damage to ALL enemies.
relics.flavorText: Unnaturally sharp.

relics.name: Magic Mallet
relics.description: Whenever you apply Weak, gain 1 Wiz, up to 3 times per turn.
relics.flavorText: Stubs toes twice as hard.

relics.name: Matryoshka
relics.description: The next 2 non-Boss chests you open contain 2 Relics.
relics.flavorText: A stackable set of painted dolls. The paint depicts an unknown bird with white eyes and blue feathers.

relics.name: Meat on the Bone
relics.description: If your HP is at or below 50% at the end of combat, heal 12 HP.
relics.flavorText: The meat keeps replenishing, never seeming to fully run out.

relics.name: Mercury Hourglass
relics.description: At the start of your turn, deal 3 damage to ALL enemies.
relics.flavorText: An enchanted hourglass that endlessly drips.

relics.name: Molten Egg
relics.description: Whenever you add an Attack into your deck, Upgrade it.
relics.flavorText: The egg of a Phoenix. It glows red hot with a simmering lava.

relics.name: Mummified Hand
relics.description: Whenever you play a Power card, a random card in your hand costs 0 that turn.
relics.flavorText: Frequently twitches, especially when your pulse is high.

relics.name: Ninja Scroll
relics.description: At the start of each combat, add 3 Shivs into your hand.
relics.flavorText: Contains the secrets of assassination.

relics.name: Ornamental Fan
relics.description: Every time you play 3 Attacks in a single turn, gain 4 Block.
relics.flavorText: The fan seems to extend and harden as blood is spilled.

relics.name: Pantograph
relics.description: At the start of Boss combats, heal 25 HP.
relics.flavorText: "Solid foundations are not accidental. Tools for planning are a must." - The Architect

relics.name: Paper Krane
relics.description: Enemies with Weak deal 40% less damage rather than 25%.
relics.flavorText: An origami of a creature from a past age.

relics.name: Paper Phrog
relics.description: Enemies with Vulnerable take 75% more damage rather than 50%.
relics.flavorText: The paper continually folds and unfolds itself into the shape of a small creature.

relics.name: Pear
relics.description: Upon pickup, raise your Max HP by 10.
relics.flavorText: A common fruit before the Spireblight.

relics.name: Pilot's Codex
relics.description: If you end your turn with no cards in guardianmod:Stasis, choose 1 of 3 cards to place into guardianmod:Stasis.
relics.flavorText: Designs and diagrams of the Spire's earliest manually-driven prototypes, by Master Pilot David.

relics.name: Question Card
relics.description: Future card rewards have 1 additional card to choose from.
relics.flavorText: "Those with more choices minimize the downside to chaos." - Kublai the Great

relics.name: Red Candle
relics.description: Whenever an Attack deals unblocked damage, apply 2 hexamod:Soulburn.
relics.flavorText: Fire BURNS...

relics.name: Ring of the Snek
relics.description: At the start of combat, apply 0-2 Weak and Vulnerable to ALL enemies.
relics.flavorText: Illegible, unreadable, due by Thursday.

relics.name: Self-Forming Clay
relics.description: Whenever you lose HP, gain 3 Block next turn.
relics.flavorText: "Most curious! It appears to form itself loosely on my thoughts! Tele-clay?" - Ranwid

relics.name: Shuriken
relics.description: Every time you play 3 Attacks in a single turn, gain 1 Strength.
relics.flavorText: Lightweight throwing weapons. Recommend going for the eyes.

relics.name: Singing Bowl
relics.description: When adding cards into your deck, you may raise your Max HP by 2 instead.
relics.flavorText: This well-used artifact rings out with a beautiful melody when struck.

relics.name: Slime Soup
relics.description: When you enter a Rest Site, begin the next combat with a Prepare card that costs 0.
relics.flavorText: Tastes awful, but incredibly healthy.

relics.name: Spyglass
relics.description: If you end your turn hermit:Concentrated, gain an additional [E] next turn .
relics.flavorText: Property of Kestin Highfin.

relics.name: Straight Razor
relics.description: Whenever you remove a card from your deck, heal 15 HP.
relics.flavorText: For a cleaner shave...

relics.name: Strike Dummy
relics.description: Cards containing "Strike" deal 3 additional damage.
relics.flavorText: It's beat up.

relics.name: Sundial
relics.description: Every 3 times you shuffle your draw pile, gain [E] [E] .
relics.flavorText: "Early man's foolish obsession with time caused them to look to the sky for guidance, hoping for something permanent." - Zoroth

relics.name: Super Snecko Eye
relics.description: Replaces Snecko Eye. At the start of your turn, draw 2 additional cards. Start each combat Confused. The first time you draw a card that costs 3 each combat, reduce its cost to 0.

relics.name: Symbiotic Virus
relics.description: At the start of each combat, Channel 1 Dark.
relics.flavorText: A little bit of bad can do a lot of good...

relics.name: Teardrop Locket
relics.description: Start each combat in Calm.
relics.flavorText: Its owner blind, its contents unseen.

relics.name: The Courier
relics.description: The Merchant restocks cards, relics, and potions. All prices are reduced by 20%.
relics.flavorText: The Merchant's personal pet!

relics.name: Toxic Egg
relics.description: Whenever you add a Skill into your deck, Upgrade it.
relics.flavorText: "What a marvelous discovery! This appears to be the inert egg of some magical creature. Who or what created this?" - Ranwid

relics.name: White Beast Statue
relics.description: Potions always appear in combat rewards.
relics.flavorText: A small white statue of a creature you have never seen before.

relics.name: Wizard Staff
relics.description: Wiz deals 7 additional damage.
relics.flavorText: The pride and joy of every Gremlin Wizard, this staff is a frequent target of theft by rival mobs.

relics.name: Wound Poker
relics.description: At the end of each turn, deal 6 damage to each Weakened enemy.
relics.flavorText: Does it hurt when I do this?.

relics.name: Bird-Faced Urn
relics.description: Whenever you play a Power card, heal 2 HP.
relics.flavorText: This urn shows the crow god Mazaleth looking mischievous.

relics.name: Black Powder
relics.description: At the end of your turn, deal 2 damage to ALL enemies for each hermit:Dead_On effect triggered.
relics.flavorText: Handle with care.

relics.name: Calipers
relics.description: At the start of your turn, lose 15 Block rather than all of your Block.
relics.flavorText: "Mechanical precision leads to greatness" - The Architect

relics.name: Captain's Wheel
relics.description: At the start of your 3rd turn, gain 18 Block.
relics.flavorText: Wooden trinket carved with delicate precision. A name is carved into it but the language is foreign.

relics.name: Champion Belt
relics.description: Whenever you apply Vulnerable, apply 1 Weak.
relics.flavorText: Only the greatest may wear this belt.

relics.name: Charon's Ashes
relics.description: Whenever you Exhaust a card, deal 3 damage to ALL enemies.
relics.flavorText: Charon was said to be the god of rebirth, eternally dying and reviving in a burst of flame.

relics.name: Charred Glove
relics.description: Whenever you draw a Curse, your next attack deals 3 more damage.
relics.flavorText: Parts of the glove still glow with otherworldly cinders.

relics.name: Cloak Clasp
relics.description: At the end of your turn, gain 1 Block for each card in your hand.
relics.flavorText: A simple but sturdy design.

relics.name: Dead Branch
relics.description: Whenever you Exhaust a card, add a random card into your hand.
relics.flavorText: The branch of a tree from a forgotten era.

relics.name: Deflecting Bracers
relics.description: At the start of your turn, gain champ:Counter equal to half the amount of expired Block.
relics.flavorText: If you thought blocking was good then...

relics.name: Du-Vu Doll
relics.description: For each Curse in your deck, start each combat with 1 Strength.
relics.flavorText: A doll devised to gain strength from malicious energy.

relics.name: Dueling Glove
relics.description: After using a single-target Attack, if the target has no Vulnerable, apply 1 Vulnerable.
relics.flavorText: Count from ten...

relics.name: Emotion Chip
relics.description: If you lost HP during the previous turn, trigger the passive ability of all Orbs at the start of your turn.

relics.name: Fossilized Helix
relics.description: Prevent the first time you would lose HP each combat.
relics.flavorText: Seemingly indestructible, you wonder what kind of creature this belonged to.

relics.name: Frost Primer
relics.description: All Functions you create gain Retain.
relics.flavorText: 22 ounces of the chemical compound Ar22, shelf life: 22 years. Best stored in a mahogany fridge.

relics.name: Gambling Chip
relics.description: At the start of each combat, discard any number of cards, then draw that many cards.
relics.flavorText: You can see a small inscription on one side. It reads: "Bear's Lucky Chip!"

relics.name: Gemstone Gun
relics.description: Upon pickup, choose 3 guardianmod:Gems. At the start of each combat, gain a card with Retain, Exhaust, and each chosen Gem socketed.
relics.flavorText: Bang! Bang! Bang! Hey, I matched three!

relics.name: Ginger
relics.description: You can no longer become Weakened.
relics.flavorText: A potent tool in many tonics.

relics.name: Girya
relics.description: You can now gain Strength at Rest Sites (up to 3 times).
relics.flavorText: This Girya is unfathomably heavy. You could train with this to get significantly stronger.

relics.name: Gladiators Manual
relics.description: Whenever you play a Combo, a Finisher, and enter a Stance in the same turn, gain 1 Strength and Dexterity.
relics.flavorText: Try everything - something will stick.

relics.name: Golden Eye
relics.description: Whenever you Scry, Scry 2 additional cards.
relics.flavorText: See into the minds of those nearby, predicting their future moves.

relics.name: Gremlin Bomb
relics.description: Whenever a Gremlin dies, deal 30 damage to ALL enemies.
relics.flavorText: Gremlins have an uncanny knack for finding dangerous things. Sometimes, they even survive looting them.

relics.name: Gremlin Gravestone
relics.description: Dead Gremlins can be Resurrected at Rest Sites as a Free Action.
relics.flavorText: Where do gremlins go when they die? Not bloody far enough.

relics.name: Horseshoe
relics.description: Whenever you gain Weak, Frail or Vulnerable, gain 1 less.
relics.flavorText: Lucky charm. Somebody is gonna be missing this.

relics.name: Ice Cream
relics.description: Energy is now conserved between turns.
relics.flavorText: "Delicious!"

relics.name: Incense Burner
relics.description: Every 6 turns, gain 1 Intangible.
relics.flavorText: The smoke imbues its owner with the spirit of the burned.

relics.name: Lizard Tail
relics.description: When you would die, heal to 50% of your Max HP instead (works once).
relics.flavorText: A fake tail to trick enemies during combat.

relics.name: Magic Flower
relics.description: Healing is 50% more effective during combat.
relics.flavorText: A flower long thought extinct, somehow preserved in perfect condition.

relics.name: Mallet
relics.description: At the start of each combat, add 2 copies of Fine Tuning+ to your hand.
relics.flavorText: That's it! I'm gettin me mallet!

relics.name: Mango
relics.description: Upon pickup, raise your Max HP by 14.
relics.flavorText: The most coveted forgotten fruit. Impeccably preserved with no signs of Spireblight.

relics.name: Old Coin
relics.description: Upon pickup, gain 300 Gold.
relics.flavorText: Unique coins are highly valued by merchants for their historical value and rare metallic composition.

relics.name: Peace Pipe
relics.description: You can now remove cards from your deck at Rest Sites.
relics.flavorText: Clears the mind and cleanses the soul.

relics.name: Pocketwatch
relics.description: Whenever you play 3 or less cards during your turn, draw 3 additional cards at the start of your next turn.
relics.flavorText: The hands seem stuck on the 3 o'clock position.

relics.name: Prayer Wheel
relics.description: Normal enemies drop an additional card reward.
relics.flavorText: The wheel continues to spin, never stopping.

relics.name: Prickly Shields
relics.description: Whenever you gain Block, deal 2 damage to a random enemy.
relics.flavorText: Gremlins use whatever scraps they can find as weapons or armor. Some serve as both.

relics.name: Red Scarf
relics.description: Whenever you apply a debuff to an enemy, gain 2 Block.
relics.flavorText: It's warm and fuzzy.

relics.name: Sack of Gems
relics.description: Upon pickup, add 5 random guardianmod:Gems to your deck.
relics.flavorText: Ooh... shiny!

relics.name: Shovel
relics.description: You can now Dig for relics at Rest Sites.
relics.flavorText: The Spire houses all number of relics from past civilizations and powerful adventurers lost to time. Time to go dig them up!

relics.name: Signature Finisher
relics.description: Upon pickup, choose a Finisher. This Finisher costs 0, can be used without a Stance, and never causes your Stance to be exited.
relics.flavorText: And now, it's time for my ULTIMATE MOVE!

relics.name: Six-Point Brand
relics.description: Whenever you play 6 cards, deal 6 damage to a random enemy.
relics.flavorText: Fire, fire, fire, fire, fire, FIRE!

relics.name: Slimed Tail
relics.description: When you fall below 50% of your Maximum HP, slimeboundmod:Split into a slimeboundmod:Guerilla Slime, and the next time you take damage, your leading slime is slimeboundmod:Absorbed instead. (works once per combat).
relics.flavorText: A fake tail to trick enemies during combat, completely covered in slime.

relics.name: Slimy Skull
relics.description: Whenever you apply slimeboundmod:Goop, apply an additional 1 slimeboundmod:Goop.
relics.flavorText: A Snecko skull in absolutely awful condition. Unclean and slimy, dirt and grime stick to it like glue.

relics.name: Snake-Charmer's Flute
relics.description: sneckomod:Muddled cards can't cost 3.
relics.flavorText: Sssssss...

relics.name: Soul of Chaos
relics.description:
The fourth Ghostflame becomes a Mayhem Ghostflame.
Mayhem Ghostflame activates when you end your turn on it.
Ignition: Play the top card of your draw pile.
relics.flavorText: Mayhem, made manifest.

relics.name: Spectre's Hand
relics.description: Whenever you Enter a Stance, gain a basic Strike or Defend. It costs 0 and has Exhaust.
relics.flavorText: Some victories stay with you.

relics.name: Stone Calendar
relics.description: At the end of turn 7, deal 52 damage to ALL enemies.
relics.flavorText: The passage of time is imperceptible in the Spire.

relics.name: Stone of Nomakk
relics.description: At the start of combat, Split into a slimeboundmod:Mire Slime and gain 1 slimeboundmod:Potency.
relics.flavorText: When presented to one of your Goop Gang, it seems to make the blob dance.

relics.name: The Specimen
relics.description: Whenever an enemy dies, transfer any Poison it has to a random enemy.
relics.flavorText: "Fascinating! I found a mutated creature demonstrating astounding toxic properties. Storing a sample for later examination." - Ranwid

relics.name: Thermal Stone
relics.description: If hexamod:Soulburn detonates, heal 4 HP at the end of combat.
relics.flavorText: A fire would liven this thing up!

relics.name: Thread and Needle
relics.description: Start each combat with 4 Plated Armor.
relics.flavorText: Wrapping the magical thread around your body, you feel harder to the touch.

relics.name: Tingsha
relics.description: Whenever you discard a card during your turn, deal 3 damage to a random enemy.
relics.flavorText: The sound this instrument generates seems to be capable of reverberating to painful levels of volume.

relics.name: Torii
relics.description: Whenever you would receive 5 or less unblocked attack damage, reduce it to 1.
relics.flavorText: Holding the small Torii, you feel a sense of calm and safety drift through your mind.

relics.name: Tough Bandages
relics.description: Whenever you discard a card during your turn, gain 3 Block.
relics.flavorText: Loss gives strength.

relics.name: Tungsten Rod
relics.description: Whenever you would lose HP, lose 1 less.
relics.flavorText: It's very very heavy.

relics.name: Turnip
relics.description: You can no longer become Frail.
relics.flavorText: Best with Ginger.

relics.name: Unceasing Top
relics.description: Whenever you have no cards in hand during your turn, draw a card.
relics.flavorText: The top continues to spin effortlessly as if you were in a dream.

relics.name: Unidentified Egg
relics.description:
Identifying becomes a free action.
Unidentified cards in card rewards are Upgraded.
relics.flavorText: What will hatch? Pay $1000 to see.

relics.name: Wing Boots
relics.description: You may ignore paths when choosing the next room to travel to 3 times.
relics.flavorText: Stylish.

relics.name: Bandit Contract
relics.description: At the start of the 3rd boss combat, Red Mask Bandits will assist you.
relics.flavorText: An agreement from the Bandit trio - partially in exchange for a trinket, but mostly in exchange for their lives.

relics.name: Bandit Contract+
relics.description: At the start of the 3rd boss combat, Red Mask Bandits will assist you.
relics.flavorText: An agreement from the Bandit trio - partially in exchange for a trinket, but mostly in exchange for their lives.

relics.name: Black Knight's Helm
relics.description:
The first time you enter each Stance each combat:
Defensive: Gain 2 Dexterity and lose 1 Strength.
Berserker: Gain 2 Strength and lose 1 Dexterity.
relics.flavorText: Only a flesh wound.

relics.name: Bloody Idol
relics.description: Whenever you gain Gold, heal 5 HP.
relics.flavorText: The idol now weeps a constant stream of blood.

relics.name: Bottled Code
relics.description: Upon pickup, choose a card with Encode. Start each combat with this card Encoded.
relics.flavorText: Actually, I have code for that exact thing...

relics.name: Broken Wing Statue
relics.description: The cultists that worship the Awakened One will be interested in this.
relics.flavorText: A broken hunk of a once-magnificent statue.

relics.name: Coat of Many Faces
relics.description: Upon pickup, gain Cultist Headpiece, Face Of Cleric, N'loth's Hungry Face, Gremlin Visage, and Ssserpent Head.
relics.flavorText: It was Steve, and Bill, and Ian, and Fred, and John...

relics.name: Cultist Headpiece
relics.description: You feel more talkative.
relics.flavorText: Part of the Flock!

relics.name: Emerald Heart Blessing
relics.description: Start each combat with 1 Dexterity.
relics.flavorText: The heart is everything.

relics.name: Enchiridion
relics.description: At the start of each combat, add a random Power card into your hand. It costs 0 for that turn.
relics.flavorText: The legendary journal of an ancient lich.

relics.name: Extra Cursed Bell
relics.description: Upon pickup, obtain 2 of a unique Curse and 3 relics.
relics.flavorText: You think you hear it echoing, but can never confirm it.

relics.name: Extra Cursed Key
relics.description:
Gain [E] at the start of your turn.
Whenever you open a non-Boss chest, obtain 2 Curses.
relics.flavorText: Locked away for good reason.

relics.name: Face Of Cleric
relics.description: At the end of combat, raise your Max HP by 1.
relics.flavorText: Everyone loves Cleric.

relics.name: Golden Idol
relics.description: Enemies drop 25% more Gold.
relics.flavorText: Made of solid gold, you feel richer just holding it.

relics.name: Greed Ooze
relics.description:
At the start of combat, spawn Greed Ooze.
At Rest Sites, Greed Ooze will take 50 of your souls, increasing its damage by 1.
When Greed Ooze is absorbed gain Revive Greed.
Revive Greed (2 (1) [E] ): Retain. Split into Greed Ooze. Exhaust.
relics.flavorText: A friend found in the Spire who devours souls.

relics.name: Gremlin Sack
relics.description: Upon pickup, add 6 cards to your deck from the Match Game.
relics.flavorText: The Gremlin and his bodyguard were no match for you.

relics.name: Gremlin Visage
relics.description: Start each combat with 1 Weak.
relics.flavorText: Time to run.

relics.name: Inner Strength
relics.description: Start each combat with 1 Strength.
relics.flavorText: It's about the gigantic sword in your heart.

relics.name: Knowing Skull
relics.description: At the start of each combat, add a **Knowing Skull** to your hand.
relics.flavorText: Put me down!

relics.name: Mark of the Bloom
relics.description: You can no longer heal.
relics.flavorText: In the Beyond, thoughts and reality are one.

relics.name: Mutagenic Strength
relics.description: Start each combat with 3 Strength. At the end of your first turn, lose 3 Strength.
relics.flavorText: "The results seem fleeting, triggering when the subject is in danger." - Unknown

relics.name: Mystical Octahedron
relics.description: Upon pickup, choose a card that selects a random number for its effects. This card always selects its maximum possible number.
relics.flavorText: It appears weighted toward one side.

relics.name: N'loth's Gift
relics.description: Triple the chance of finding Rare cards from combat rewards.
relics.flavorText: The strange gift from N'loth. Whenever you try and unwrap it, another wrapped box of the same size lies within.

relics.name: N'loth's Hungry Face
relics.description: The next non-Boss chest you open is empty.
relics.flavorText: You feel hungry.

relics.name: Necronomicon
relics.description: The first Attack played each turn that costs 2 or more is played twice. Upon pickup, obtain a special Curse.
relics.flavorText: Only a fool would try and harness this evil power. At night your dreams are haunted by images of the book devouring your mind.

relics.name: Neow's Blessing
relics.description:
Upon pickup, increase your Maximum HP by 100.
Increase your Maximum HP by 100 at the start of each Act.
Lose all your Potion slots.
Draw 1 less card and lose [E] at the start of your turn.
relics.flavorText: Ease your rage. Be as tough and unyielding as the Spire itself.

relics.name: Neow's Lament
relics.description: Enemies in your first 3 combats will have 1 HP.
relics.flavorText: The blessing of lamentation bestowed by Neow.

relics.name: New Challenger
relics.description: Start each combat in a random Champ Stance.
relics.flavorText: Can you take the crown?

relics.name: Nilry's Codex
relics.description: At the end of your turn, you may shuffle 1 of 3 random cards into your draw pile.
relics.flavorText: Crafted by the infamous game master himself. Said to expand one's mind.

relics.name: Odd Mushroom
relics.description: When Vulnerable, take 25% more attack damage rather than 50%.
relics.flavorText: "After consuming trichella parastius I felt larger and less... susceptible." - Ranwid

relics.name: Paradox Artifact
relics.description: At the start of each turn, add a random card with Encode to your hand and give it Ethereal.
relics.flavorText: You've never seen a coding frenzy like this before.

relics.name: Quantum Chamber
relics.description: Upon pickup, choose a card. Start each combat with this card removed from your deck. At the start of your 4th turn, return it and 2 copies of it to your hand.
relics.flavorText: You get the chicken by hatching the egg, not by smashing it.

relics.name: Red Mask
relics.description: At the start of each combat, apply 1 Weak to ALL enemies.
relics.flavorText: This very stylish looking mask belongs to the leader of the Red Mask Bandits. Technically that makes you the leader now?

relics.name: Ruby Heart Blessing
relics.description: Start each combat with 1 Strength.
relics.flavorText: The heart is strong.

relics.name: Sapphire Heart Blessing
relics.description: Upon pickup, raise your Max HP by 10.
relics.flavorText: The heart is pleased.

relics.name: Scrap Ooze
relics.description:
At the start of combat, spawn Scrap Ooze (can be revived if Absorbed).
At Rest Sites, you can donate a card to the Scrap Ooze, modifying its damage:
+1 damage for Uncommons
+2 damage for Rares
-1 damage for Commons
-2 damage for Curses

relics.name: Sharpened Fragment
relics.description: At the start of each turn, gain a Crystal Shiv.
relics.flavorText: Once a broken statue - now a makeshift weapon.

relics.name: Spirit Poop
relics.description: It's unpleasant.
relics.flavorText: The charred remains of your offering to the spirits.

relics.name: Ssserpent Head
relics.description: Whenever you enter a ? room, gain 50 Gold.
relics.flavorText: The most fulfilling of lives is that in which you can buy anything!

relics.name: Teleport Stone
relics.description: You may skip any number of rooms the next time you move, but cannot move into a Boss Room.
relics.flavorText: Never leave home without it.

relics.name: The Broken Seal
relics.description: Upon pickup, raise your Max HP by 10, then heal all of your HP. Start each combat with 2 Strength, 2 Dexterity, and 2 hexamod:Intensity. You can not receive The Broken Seal again.
relics.flavorText: Unlimited, unrestrained, unquenchable power.

relics.name: The Heart's Malice
relics.description: Enemies in your first 3 combats will flee in terror.
relics.flavorText: The malice of corruption bestowed by the Heart.

relics.name: Warped Tongs
relics.description: At the start of your turn, Upgrade a random card in your hand for the rest of combat.
relics.flavorText: The cursed tongs emit a strong desire to return to where they were stolen from.

relics.name: Wheel of Change
relics.description: At each Rest Site, you may spin the wheel once. Choosing to collect its reward uses up this relic.
relics.flavorText: No one gets two spins, he says.

relics.name: Young Snecko
relics.description: Deals 5 damage to a random enemy at the start of your turn.
relics.flavorText: Bewilderingly adorable.

relics.name: Astrolabe
relics.description: Upon pickup, Transform 3 cards, then Upgrade them.
relics.flavorText: A tool to glean invaluable knowledge from the stars.

relics.name: Black Blood
relics.description: Replaces Burning Blood. At the end of combat, heal 12 HP.
relics.flavorText: The rage grows darker.

relics.name: Black Heart of Goo
relics.description:
Replaces Heart of Goo.
Whenever you slimeboundmod:Consume, heal 3 HP, up to 15 each combat.
relics.flavorText: The Secret of the Ooze.

relics.name: Black Star
relics.description: Elites drop an additional relic when defeated.
relics.flavorText: Originally discovered in the town of the serpent, beside a solitary candle.

relics.name: Busted Crown
relics.description: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. Future card rewards have 2 less cards to choose from.
relics.flavorText: The Champ's crown... or a pale imitation?

relics.name: Calling Bell
relics.description: Upon pickup, obtain a unique Curse and 3 relics.
relics.flavorText: This dark iron bell rang 3 times when you found it, but now stays silent.

relics.name: Clasped Locket
relics.description: Replaces Old Locket. First time you draw a curse each turn, Exhaust it and draw 2 cards. Upon pickup, obtain 2 Injuries.
relics.flavorText: It won't open anymore.

relics.name: Coffee Dripper
relics.description: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. You can no longer Rest at Rest Sites.
relics.flavorText: "Yes, another cup please. Back to work. Back to work!" - The Architect

relics.name: Cursed Key
relics.description: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. Whenever you open a non-Boss chest, obtain a Curse.
relics.flavorText: You can feel the malicious energy emanating from the key. Power comes at a price.

relics.name: Dented Plate
relics.description: While your HP is at or below 50%, gain [E] and draw 1 card at the start of your turn.
relics.flavorText: Several bullets are still lodged inside.

relics.name: Ectoplasm
relics.description: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. You can no longer gain Gold.
relics.flavorText: This blob of slime and energy seems to pulse with life.

relics.name: Electromagnetic Coil
relics.description: Functions are now made up of 4 cards.
relics.flavorText: An inefficient but entertaining power source.

relics.name: Empty Cage
relics.description: Upon pickup, remove 2 cards from your deck.
relics.flavorText: "How unusual to cage that which you worship." - Ranwid

relics.name: Frozen Core
relics.description: Replaces Cracked Core. If you end your turn with any empty Orb slots, Channel 1 Frost.
relics.flavorText: The crack in your core has been filled with a pulsating cold energy.

relics.name: Fusion Hammer
relics.description: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. You can no longer Smith at Rest Sites.
relics.flavorText: Once wielded, the owner can never let go.

relics.name: Gremlin Leader's Voucher
relics.description:
Gain [E] at the start of your turn.
Upon pickup, permanently lose a Gremlin.Gain [E] at the start of your turn.
Upon pickup, permanently lose a Gremlin.
relics.flavorText: IOU 1 Gremlin

relics.name: Guardian Gear
relics.description:
Replaces Bronze Gear.
Begin each combat in guardianmod:Defensive_Mode, which persists for 3 turns.
relics.flavorText: Replace every 3,000 floors.

relics.name: Holy Water
relics.description: Replaces Pure Water. At the start of each combat, add 3 Miracles into your hand.
relics.flavorText: Collected from a time before the Spire.

relics.name: Hovering Kite
relics.description: The first time you discard a card each turn, gain [E] .
relics.flavorText: The Kite floats around you in battle, propelled by a mysterious force.

relics.name: Idol of Retromation
relics.description: At the start of your turn, reduce the cost of the most expensive card in your hand by 1 for this turn.
relics.flavorText: Often called the Idol of Reto for short.

relics.name: Inserter
relics.description: Every 2 turns, gain 1 Orb slot.
relics.flavorText: Push. Pull. Stack. Repeat.

relics.name: Lucky Horseshoe
relics.description: Upon pickup, choose 1 of 3 Unidentified Character cards. Add 5 copies of it to your deck. All combats drop an additional card reward of the chosen character's cards.
relics.flavorText: Make your own luck.

relics.name: Makeshift Battery
relics.description: Gain [E] and add a Slimed into your discard pile at the start of your turn.
relics.flavorText: It's an 8.9 volt.

relics.name: Mark of Pain
relics.description: Gain [R] at the start of your turn. At the start of combat, shuffle 2 Wounds into your draw pile.
relics.flavorText: This brand was used by the northern tribes to signify warriors who had mastered pain in battle.

relics.name: Mark of the Ether
relics.description:
Replaces Spirit Brand.
The first time you Ignite a Ghostflame each turn, gain [E] .
relics.flavorText: Letâ€™s see if we can do... better.

relics.name: Mob Leader's Crown
relics.description:
Replaces Mob Leader's Staff.
The first time you shuffle your draw pile each turn, gain [E] , draw 1 card, and Swap to the next Gremlin.
relics.flavorText: The fancier the symbol of office, the more likely it is to be stolen.

relics.name: Nuclear Battery
relics.description: At the start of each combat, Channel 1 Plasma.
relics.flavorText: Ooooh...

relics.name: Pandora's Box
relics.description: Upon pickup, Transform all Strike and Defend cards.
relics.flavorText: You have a bad feeling about opening this.

relics.name: Philosopher's Stone
relics.description: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. ALL enemies start combat with 1 Strength.
relics.flavorText: Raw energy emanates from the stone, empowering all nearby.

relics.name: Platinum Core
relics.description:
Replaces Bronze Core.
The first 3 Functions you create each combat cost 0 until played.
relics.flavorText: Changelog: Improved user experience.

relics.name: Power Armor
relics.description:
Gain [E] at the start of your turn.
Your maximum Vigor and champ:Counter is 10.
relics.flavorText: Bought used.

relics.name: Ring of the Serpent
relics.description: Replaces Ring of the Snake. At the start of your turn, draw 1 additional card.
relics.flavorText: Your ring has morphed and changed forms.

relics.name: Runic Cube
relics.description: Whenever you lose HP, draw 1 card.
relics.flavorText: The runes are indecipherable.

relics.name: Runic Dome
relics.description: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. You can no longer see enemy intents.
relics.flavorText: The runes are indecipherable.

relics.name: Runic Pyramid
relics.description: At the end of your turn, you no longer discard your hand.
relics.flavorText: The runes are indecipherable.

relics.name: Sacred Bark
relics.description: Double the effectiveness of potions.
relics.flavorText: A bark rumored to originate from the World tree.

relics.name: Short Stature
relics.description: The first time a Gremlin would die each combat, heal it to 75% of your Max HP instead.
relics.flavorText: It is easy to get away with mischief if you are literally beneath their notice.

relics.name: Shotglass
relics.description: First 2 times you use a potion each combat, gain a random potion. You can only use 2 potions each combat.
relics.flavorText: Any liquid placed inside changes into something else.

relics.name: Slaver's Collar
relics.description: During Boss and Elite combats, gain [E] at the start of your turn.
relics.flavorText: Rusty miserable chains.

relics.name: Snecko Eye
relics.description: At the start of your turn, draw 2 additional cards. Start each combat Confused.
relics.flavorText: An eye of a fallen snecko. Much larger than you imagined.

relics.name: Sozu
relics.description: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. You can no longer obtain potions.
relics.flavorText: You notice that magical liquids seem to lose their properties when near this relic.

relics.name: Super Snecko Soul
relics.description:
Replaces Snecko Soul[].
The first time you play an sneckomod:Offclass each turn, gain [E] .

relics.name: Tarr Blob
relics.description: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. At the start of combat, lose 1 Slime slot.
relics.flavorText: The bad kind of Slime.

relics.name: Tiny Bowler Hat
relics.description: At the start of combat, add a Study the Spire card to your hand. It costs 0.
relics.flavorText: Whosoever controls the hat, controls the Spire.

relics.name: Tiny House
relics.description:
Upon pickup, obtain 1 potion.
Gain 50 Gold.
Raise your Max HP by 5.
Obtain 1 card.
Upgrade 1 random card.
relics.flavorText: "A near perfect implementation of miniaturization. My finest work to date, but still not adequate." - The Architect

relics.name: Velvet Choker
relics.description: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. You cannot play more than 6 cards per turn.
relics.flavorText: "Immense power, but too limited." - Kublai the Great

relics.name: Victorious Crown
relics.description:
Replaces Champion's Crown.
Start each combat in champ:Ultimate Stance, which lasts for 1 turn.
relics.flavorText: Conglaturation!! You are the greatest winner.

relics.name: Violet Lotus
relics.description: Whenever you exit Calm, gain an additional [E] .
relics.flavorText: The old texts describe that the surface of "mana pools" were littered with these flowers.

relics.name: Wander Bots
relics.description:
On pickup, lose 2 Stasis slots.
Gain [E] at the start of your turn.
relics.flavorText: These drones find the most wonderful salvage, but require processing power to maintain.

relics.name: Wrist Blade
relics.description: Attacks that cost 0 deal 4 additional damage.
relics.flavorText: Handy for assassinations.

relics.name: Xanatos' Icy Charm
relics.description: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. hexamod:Soulburn takes 4 turns to activate.
relics.flavorText: I feel... cold.

relics.name: Barbell
relics.description: Whenever you enter a Rest Site, if you have at least 10 Upgradable cards in your deck, Upgrade one at random.
relics.flavorText: 1000 reps? Psh. I can do 1001.

relics.name: Berserker's Guide
relics.description: At the start of your turn, gain 3 Vigor.
relics.flavorText: The text is illegible.

relics.name: Bottled Anomaly
relics.description: Upon pickup, choose a card. At the start of each combat, remove it from your draw pile. At the start of turn 3, add it into your hand. It costs 0.
relics.flavorText: Swirling and swirling and finally breaking.

relics.name: Bottled Black Hole
relics.description: Upon pickup, choose a card. Start each combat with this card in guardianmod:Stasis.
relics.flavorText: Somewhere, something incredible is waiting to be known.

relics.name: Brimstone
relics.description: At the start of your turn, gain 2 Strength and ALL enemies gain 1 Strength.
relics.flavorText: Emanates an infernal heat.

relics.name: Cauldron
relics.description: Upon pickup, brews 5 random potions.
relics.flavorText: The Merchant is actually a rather skilled potion brewer. Buy 4 get 1 free.

relics.name: Chemical X
relics.description: The effects of your cost X cards are increased by 2.
relics.flavorText: WARNING: Do not combine with sugar, spice, and everything nice.

relics.name: Clockwork Souvenir
relics.description: Start each combat with 1 Artifact.
relics.flavorText: "So many intricate gears."

relics.name: Cryo Chamber
relics.description: Gain 1 Stasis slot. Whenever a card enters guardianmod:Stasis, Upgrade it.
relics.flavorText: Things always seem better coming out than they did going in.

relics.name: Dolly's Mirror
relics.description: Upon pickup, obtain an additional copy of a card in your deck.
relics.flavorText: "I look funny in this."

relics.name: Donu's Washers
relics.description: At the start of combat, gain [E] [E] and add 1 Void into your draw pile.
relics.flavorText: It is rather clear why Donu collects these.

relics.name: Frozen Eye
relics.description: When viewing your Draw Pile, the cards are now shown in order.
relics.flavorText: Staring into the eye, you see a glimpse of your future.

relics.name: Hand Drill
relics.description: Whenever you break an enemy's Block, apply 2 Vulnerable.
relics.flavorText: "Spirals are dangerous."

relics.name: Lee's Waffle
relics.description: Upon pickup, raise your Max HP by 7 and heal all of your HP.
relics.flavorText: "Tastiest treat you will find in all the Spire! Baked today just for you."

relics.name: Medical Kit
relics.description: Unplayable Status cards can now be played. Whenever you play a Status card, Exhaust it.
relics.flavorText: "Has everything you need! Anti-itch, anti-burn, anti-venom, and more!"

relics.name: Melange
relics.description: Whenever you shuffle your draw pile, Scry 3.
relics.flavorText: Mysterious sands from an unknown origin. Smells of cinnamon.

relics.name: Membership Card
relics.description: 50% discount on all products!
relics.flavorText: "Bonus membership offer for my most valuable customers!"

relics.name: Olexa's Shield
relics.description: Swap the positions of the Bolstering Ghostflame and the first Searing Ghostflame.
relics.flavorText: Protection on-demand.

relics.name: Orange Pellets
relics.description: Whenever you play a Power, Attack, and Skill in the same turn, remove all of your debuffs.
relics.flavorText: "Made from various fungi found throughout the Spire, they will stave off any affliction."

relics.name: Orrery
relics.description: Upon pickup, choose and add 5 cards to your deck.
relics.flavorText: "Once you understand the universe..." - Zoroth

relics.name: Pet Ghost
relics.description: First time you would die each combat, survive with 1 HP instead.
relics.flavorText: Poor guy.

relics.name: Prismatic Shard
relics.description: Combat reward screens now contain Colorless cards and cards from other colors.
relics.flavorText: Looking through the shard, you are able to see entirely new perspectives.

relics.name: Protective Gear
relics.description: Reduce the damage you take from slimeboundmod:Tackles by 3.
relics.flavorText: The best defense is a good offense.

relics.name: Rare Booster Box
relics.description: Upon pickup, obtain a Unidentified Rare card of each card type.
relics.flavorText: Mint condition.

relics.name: Recycler
relics.description: The first time an non-Status and non-Curse Ethereal card is Exhausted each combat, add a copy to your hand that costs 0 until played.
relics.flavorText: One day, it shall be recycled too.

relics.name: Runic Capacitor
relics.description: Start each combat with 3 additional Orb slots.
relics.flavorText: More is better.

relics.name: Sleeved Ace
relics.description: At the start of each combat, gain a Pure Luck with Retain.
relics.flavorText: We're all aces.

relics.name: Sling of Courage
relics.description: Start each Elite combat with 2 Strength.
relics.flavorText: "A handy tool for dealing with particularly tough opponents."

relics.name: Stolen Merchandise
relics.description:
Whenever you Swap, gain an Echo of a random Colorless card.
At the start of combat, the Merchant gains 2 Strength.
relics.flavorText: "Blasted, thieving Gremlins!".

relics.name: Strange Spoon
relics.description: Cards which Exhaust when played will instead discard 50% of the time.
relics.flavorText: Staring at the spoon, it appears to bend and twist around before your eyes.

relics.name: Tag Teamwork
relics.description:
Whenever you draw Tag Team, draw another card.
Upon pickup, add two copies of Tag Team to your deck.
relics.flavorText: Teamwork makes the dream work.

relics.name: The Abacus
relics.description: Whenever you shuffle your draw pile, gain 6 Block.
relics.flavorText: "One...Two...Three..."

relics.name: Toolbox
relics.description: At the start of each combat, choose 1 of 3 random Colorless cards and add the chosen card into your hand.
relics.flavorText: A tool for every job.

relics.name: Twisted Funnel
relics.description: At the start of each combat, apply 4 Poison to ALL enemies.
relics.flavorText: "I wouldn't drink out of it."

potions.name: Attack Potion
potions.description: Choose 1 of 3 random Attack cards to add to your hand, it costs 0 this turn.

potions.name: Blessing of the Forge
potions.description: Upgrade all cards in your hand for the rest of combat.

potions.name: Blood Potion
potions.description: Heal for 20% of your Max HP.

potions.name: Colorless Potion
potions.description: Choose 1 of 3 random Colorless cards to add to your hand, it costs 0 this turn.

potions.name: Ecto-Cooler
potions.description: Choose 1 of 3 random Ethereal cards from any class to gain. It costs 0 this turn.

potions.name: Flex Potion
potions.description: Gain 5 Strength. At the end of your turn, lose 5 Strength.

potions.name: Machine Oil
potions.description: Increase all numbers on Encoded cards by 1 except cost.

potions.name: Power Potion
potions.description: Choose 1 of 3 random Power cards to add to your hand, it costs 0 this turn.

potions.name: Skill Potion
potions.description: Choose 1 of 3 random Skill cards to add to your hand, it costs 0 this turn.

potions.name: Speed Potion
potions.description: Gain 5 Dexterity. At the end of your turn, lose 5 Dexterity.

potions.name: Strategy Potion
potions.description: Choose 1 of 2 cards which Enter a Stance to gain (one for each Stance). It costs 0 this turn.

potions.name: Temporal Potion
potions.description: Accelerate all cards in Stasis 2 times.

potions.name: Alchyrical Elixir
potions.description: Remove all Compile Error effects from the next Function you create, it costs 0 until played.

potions.name: Bottled Technique
potions.description: Trigger your current Stance's Skill Bonus 5 times.

potions.name: Distilled Chaos
potions.description: Play the top 3 cards of your draw pile.

potions.name: Duplication Potion
potions.description: This turn, your next card is played twice.

potions.name: Elixir
potions.description: Exhaust any number of cards in your hand.

potions.name: Exotic Beverage
potions.description: Reduce the cost of Offclass cards in your hand by 1.

potions.name: Gambler's Brew
potions.description: Discard any number of cards then draw that many.

potions.name: Liquid Memories
potions.description: Choose a card in your discard pile and return it to your hand. It costs 0 this turn.

potions.name: Slimy Elixir
potions.description: Whenever an effect applies Goop this combat, apply 2 more.

potions.name: Entropic Brew
potions.description: Fill all your empty potion slots with random potions.

potions.name: Essence Of Darkness
potions.description: Channel 1 Dark for each orb slot.

potions.name: Fairy in a Bottle
potions.description: When you would die, heal to 30% of your Max HP instead and discard this potion.

potions.name: Gremlin In A Jar
potions.description: Resurrect a random Gremlin at 50% of your Max HP.

potions.name: Kio's Clever Concoction
potions.description: Choose 1 of 3 random cards to Encode, repeat until you create a Function.

potions.name: Liquid Void
potions.description: Put 1 card from your exhaust pile into your hand. It costs 0 this turn.

potions.name: Quantum Elixir
potions.description:
Gain Stasis slots until you have 3.
Repeat 3 times: choose 1 of 3 cards to place into Stasis.

potions.name: Smoke Bomb
potions.description: Escape from a non-boss combat. Receive no rewards.

potions.name: Snecko Oil
potions.description: Draw 5 cards. Randomize the cost of cards in your hand.

potions.name: Armorer's Tincture
potions.description: Gain 4 Block each time you play a card this turn.

potions.name: Ooze-Infused Drink
potions.description: Add 4 random 0-cost cards to your hand.

potions.name: Spiked Energy Drink
potions.description: :Muddle the 2 highest-cost cards in your hand. Cards :Muddled this way cannot cost 3.

potions.name: Vexing Draught
potions.description: Gain 2 Strength and 2 Dexterity. Add two :Burn+ cards to your draw pile.

potions.name: Boss Potion
potions.description: Choose 1 of 3 random :Boss cards to add to your hand, it costs 0 this turn.

potions.name: Cursed Fountain Liquid
potions.description: Apply 2 Weak, 2 Vulnerable, and reduce Strength by 2.

keywords.name: Absorb
keywords.description: Manually recombine with your leading Slime, granting you 1 Strength.

keywords.name: Accelerate
keywords.description: Reduce the turn counter of the right-most card in Stasis by 1.

keywords.name: Active
keywords.description: The Active Ghostflame can be Ignited by meeting its listed Ignition requirements.

keywords.name: Advance
keywords.description: Move to the next Ghostflame. Moving onto a Ghostflame Extinguishes it.

keywords.name: Afterlife
keywords.description: If this card is Exhausted, its effects activate.

keywords.name: Agony
keywords.description: Creatures in Agony deal 80% less damage with Attacks.

keywords.name: Ancient Slime
keywords.description: Attacks for 3 and causes you to draw 1 card each turn.

keywords.name: Berserker
keywords.description:
Stance.
Skill Bonus: Gain 2 Vigor.
Finisher Effect: Gain 1 Strength.

keywords.name: Blur
keywords.description: Do not lose Block at the end of the turn.

keywords.name: Bolstering
keywords.description: Ghostflame. Ignites when a Power is played while Active. Ignition: When Ignited, gain 4 Block and 1 Strength.

keywords.name: Boss
keywords.description: You may only play 1 Boss card in a turn.

keywords.name: Bounty
keywords.description: Normal Enemy: 15 gold. Elite Enemy: 40 gold. Boss: 100 gold.

keywords.name: Brace X
keywords.description: Reduce the HP loss required to trigger Mode Shift by X.

keywords.name: Bronze Slime
keywords.description: Attacks for 10 to ALL enemies each turn, but skips every other attack.

keywords.name: Bruise
keywords.description: Bruised targets take more attack damage. Wears off on turn end.

keywords.name: Bruiser Slime
keywords.description: Attacks for 5 each turn.

keywords.name: Buffer
keywords.description: Prevent the next time you would lose HP.

keywords.name: Buried
keywords.description: Buried cards will always be chosen last for random Exhume effects.

keywords.name: Combo
keywords.description: Extra effect when played in the listed Stance.

keywords.name: Command
keywords.description: Your leading Slime attacks.

keywords.name: Compile
keywords.description:
An effect that triggers when this card is merged into a Function.
Can be a negative effect, which is referred to as an 'Error'.

keywords.name: Concentration
keywords.description: The next Dead On card played while Concentrated triggers its effect regardless of position. Wears off on turn end.

keywords.name: Consume
keywords.description: Bonus effect which activates when an Attack is used on an enemy who has Goop.

keywords.name: Counter
keywords.description: The next time you take Attack damage, deal damage back.

keywords.name: Cripple
keywords.description: Crippled enemies can no longer lose Weak. At the end of their turn, they lose HP equal to their Weak.

keywords.name: Crushing
keywords.description: Ghostflame. Ignites when 2 Skills are played while Active. Ignition: When Ignited, deal 3 damage to a random enemy twice.

keywords.name: Cultist Slime
keywords.description: Attacks for 6 each turn, then increases its damage by 1.

keywords.name: Cycle
keywords.description: Discard a card, drawing a new card to replace it.

keywords.name: Darkling Slime
keywords.description: Attacks for 3 each turn. When Commanded, other Darkling Slimes also attack.

keywords.name: Dead On
keywords.description: Dead On cards have a bonus effect when in the middle of your hand.

keywords.name: Defensive
keywords.description:
Stance.
Skill Bonus: Gain 3 Counter.
Finisher Effect: Gain 10 Block.

keywords.name: Defensive Mode
keywords.description:
Stance.
Gain 10 Block when entering Defensive Mode.
While in Defensive Mode, you have 3 Thorns, gain 10 Block at the start of your turn, and your Block does not expire.

keywords.name: Downgrade
keywords.description: Remove an upgrade from a card.

keywords.name: Echo
keywords.description: Echoes are copies of cards with Ethereal and Exhaust.

keywords.name: Encode
keywords.description:
Encode a card.
When 3 cards are Encoded, their effects (other than Encode) are merged into a Function that costs 1.

keywords.name: Exhume
keywords.description: Put a card from your exhaust pile into your hand.

keywords.name: Extinguish
keywords.description: Allows Ghostflame to become Ignited again, resetting its Ignition requirements.

keywords.name: Fat Gremlin
keywords.description: After you play an attack, apply 1 Weak to all targets.

keywords.name: Fatigue
keywords.description: Lose HP. Restore Fatigued HP at the end of combat. You won't die from Fatigue .

keywords.name: Finisher
keywords.description:
Requires being in a Stance.
After playing a Finisher, exit your Stance and trigger its Finisher bonus.

keywords.name: Gem
keywords.description: Gems can be placed into Sockets in cards at a Rest Site. Cannot be Upgraded.

keywords.name: Ghostflame Slime
keywords.description: Attacks for 3 and applies 5 Soulburn each turn.

keywords.name: Gladiator
keywords.description:
Stance.
Skill Bonus: Draw a card.
Finisher Bonus: Next turn, draw 1 card and gain [E] . End your turn.

keywords.name: Goop
keywords.description: The next attack deals 1 more damage per Goop, removing all Goop and triggering any Consume effects.

keywords.name: Gremlin Nob
keywords.description:
At the start of your turn, add the following cards with Ethereal and Exhaust to your hand:

Bellow (0 [E] ): Gain 2 (3) Strength for each enemy that does not intend to Attack.
Skull Bash (1 [E] ): Deal 6 (8) damage. Apply 2 Vulnerable.
Rush (1 [E] ): Deal 14 (16) damage.

You can no longer :Swap. When you would lose all :Temporary :HP, prevent further damage and revert back.

keywords.name: Gremlin Wizard
keywords.description: After you play a skill, gain 1 Wiz.

keywords.name: Guerilla Slime
keywords.description: Attacks for 3 to ALL enemies each turn.

keywords.name: Identify
keywords.description: Replace an Unidentified card with its current random card permanently.

keywords.name: Ignite
keywords.description: Triggers the Ignition effect described on a Ghostflame.

keywords.name: Insert
keywords.description: Shuffle a card into your draw pile.

keywords.name: Insulting Slime
keywords.description: Attacks for 4 and applies 1 Vulnerable each turn.

keywords.name: Intensity
keywords.description: Intensity increases the amount of damage, Soulburn, and Block applied by Ghostflames when Ignited.

keywords.name: Invincible
keywords.description:
You cannot lose more than a given amount of HP in a single turn.
At the end of any round in which Invincible prevented HP loss, remove it.

keywords.name: Leeching Slime
keywords.description: Attacks for 1 and grants you 3 Block each turn.

keywords.name: Lick
keywords.description: 0-cost cards that apply Goop with a variety of secondary effects.

keywords.name: Lucky
keywords.description: Cards that choose a random number as part of their card text choose the maximum possible number. (Does not affect Muddle)

keywords.name: Mad Gremlin
keywords.description: Gain 2 Temporary Strength when attacked.

keywords.name: Mire Slime
keywords.description: Attacks for 2 and applies 2 Goop each turn.

keywords.name: Muddle
keywords.description: Muddling a card changes its cost this turn to between 0 and 3.

keywords.name: Offclass
keywords.description: An Offclass card is any obtainable card from a class other than your own (including Colorless cards, Curses, and Statuses).

keywords.name: Package
keywords.description: 0-cost Exhausting Skill that generates three cards inspired by a chosen Construct of the Spire, and reduces their cost by 1 for this combat.

keywords.name: Potency
keywords.description: Increases the damage of ALL of your Spawned Slimes. Secondary effects increase by 1 for every 2 Potency.

keywords.name: Reclaim
keywords.description: Put a card from your exhaust pile into your discard pile.

keywords.name: Retract
keywords.description: Move to the previous Ghostflame. Moving onto a Ghostflame Extinguishes it.

keywords.name: Rugged
keywords.description: Reduces next instance of attack damage taken to 2.

keywords.name: Seal
keywords.description: If all 6 Seals have been played this combat (with no redundant ones), obtain The Broken Seal and remove the Seals from your deck.

keywords.name: Searing
keywords.description: Ghostflame. Ignites when 2 Attacks are played while Active. Ignition: When Ignited, apply 4 Soulburn to a random enemy.

keywords.name: Shackled
keywords.description: Shackled creatures lose Strength for a turn.

keywords.name: Shield Gremlin
keywords.description: After you play a skill, gain 2 Block.

keywords.name: Slow
keywords.description: Receives 10% more damage per card played in a turn.

keywords.name: Sneaky Gremlin
keywords.description: After you play an attack, deal 3 damage to a random enemy.

keywords.name: Snekproof
keywords.description: Snekproof cards aren't affected by Confusion and cannot be Muddled.

keywords.name: Socket
keywords.description: Gems can be placed into this Socket at a Rest Site.

keywords.name: Soulburn
keywords.description: After 3 turns, a Soulburned enemy loses HP, removing the Soulburn effect.

keywords.name: Specialist
keywords.description: A unique slime with a more powerful effect than normal slimes.

keywords.name: Spiky Slime
keywords.description: Attacks for 4 and grants you 4 Temporary Thorns each turn.

keywords.name: Spire Boss
keywords.description: Powerful 0-cost cards, inspired by the bosses of the Spire.

keywords.name: Split
keywords.description:
Spawn a Slime minion, who attacks at the start of each turn.

If you have no empty slots, your oldest Slime is automatically Absorbed to make room, granting you 1 Strength.

keywords.name: Stasis
keywords.description:
A card in Stasis stays there for amount of turns equal to its cost plus 1.
When exits, it is returned to your hand and costs 0 until played.

keywords.name: Steal
keywords.description: Target loses specified amount of resource. You gain the amount that was lost.

keywords.name: Stun
keywords.description: Stunned enemies skip their turn.

keywords.name: Swap
keywords.description: Switch places with another character. Does nothing if there is no valid target.

keywords.name: Tackle
keywords.description: High-damage Attacks that also deal a small amount of damage to you.

keywords.name: Technique
keywords.description: If you are in a Stance, trigger its Skill Bonus.

keywords.name: Temporary HP
keywords.description: Temporary HP disappears at the end of combat.

keywords.name: Tick
keywords.description: When this card's Stasis turn counter is reduced...

keywords.name: Time Slime
keywords.description: Attacks for 4 and applies 1 Weak each turn.

keywords.name: Torch Head Slime
keywords.description: Attacks for 6 each turn. Gains damage from your Strength.

keywords.name: Ultimate Stance
keywords.description:
Stance. Counts as both Defensive and Berserker Stances.
If you leave this Stance before it expires, immediately re-enter it.

keywords.name: Volatile
keywords.description: When this card leaves Stasis, it Exhausts.

keywords.name: Wiz
keywords.description: When you have at least three stacks of Wiz, Attacks will consume all stacks to deal 10 additional damage.

keywords.name: [B]
keywords.description: Energy is used to play cards from your hand.

keywords.name: [E]
keywords.description: Energy is used to play cards from your hand.

keywords.name: [G]
keywords.description: Energy is used to play cards from your hand.

keywords.name: [R]
keywords.description: Energy is used to play cards from your hand.

keywords.name: [W]
keywords.description: Energy is used to play cards from your hand.

keywords.name: Artifact
keywords.description: Negates the next debuff.

keywords.name: Autoplay
keywords.description: This card automatically plays itself when drawn.

keywords.name: Block
keywords.description: Until next turn, prevents damage.

keywords.name: Burn
keywords.description: Burns are unplayable status cards that damage you.

keywords.name: Calm
keywords.description: Upon exiting this Stance, gain [W] [W] .

keywords.name: Channel
keywords.description: Channeling an Orb puts it into your first empty slot. If you have no empty slots, your first Orb is automatically Evoked to make room.

keywords.name: Confused
keywords.description: Whenever you draw a card, randomize its cost.

keywords.name: Curse
keywords.description: Curse cards are negative cards that stay in your deck.

keywords.name: Dark
keywords.description: Orb: Increases damage every turn. When Evoked, deals damage to the enemy with the least HP.

keywords.name: Dazed
keywords.description: Dazed are unplayable status cards.

keywords.name: Dexterity
keywords.description: Dexterity improves Block gained from cards.

keywords.name: Divinity
keywords.description: Upon entering this stance, gain [W] [W] [W] . Attacks deal triple damage. Exit this Stance at the start of your next turn.

keywords.name: Ethereal
keywords.description: If this card is in your hand at the end of turn, it is exhausted. Exhausted cards are removed from your deck until the end of combat.

keywords.name: Evoke
keywords.description: Consume your rightmost Orb and use its Evoke effect.

keywords.name: Exhaust
keywords.description: Removed until end of combat.

keywords.name: Exhaustive
keywords.description: Exhausts after a certain number of uses.

keywords.name: Fatal
keywords.description: Triggers whenever this card kills a non-minion enemy.

keywords.name: Fetch
keywords.description: Choose a specified card from a specified pile and place it into your hand.

keywords.name: Fleeting
keywords.description: This card Purges and is removed from your deck on use.

keywords.name: Focus
keywords.description: Focus increases the effectiveness of Channeled Orbs.

keywords.name: Frail
keywords.description: While Frail, gain 25% less Block from cards.

keywords.name: Frost
keywords.description: Orb: Gains Block.

keywords.name: Grave
keywords.description: Start each combat with this card in your discard pile.

keywords.name: Innate
keywords.description: Start each combat with this card in your hand.

keywords.name: Intangible
keywords.description: Reduce ALL damage taken and HP loss to 1.

keywords.name: Lightning
keywords.description: Orb: Deals damage to random enemies.

keywords.name: Lock-on
keywords.description: Lock-On targets receive 50% more damage from Orbs.

keywords.name: Locked
keywords.description: This card has yet to be unlocked.

keywords.name: Mantra
keywords.description: When you obtain 10 Mantra, enter Divinity.

keywords.name: Opener
keywords.description: Opener cards may only be played as the first card each turn.

keywords.name: Plasma
keywords.description: Orb: Gains Energy.

keywords.name: Poison
keywords.description: Poisoned creatures lose HP at the start of their turn. Each turn, Poison is reduced by 1.

keywords.name: Purge
keywords.description: Removed until end of combat. Does NOT go to your exhaust pile.

keywords.name: Refund
keywords.description: Returns energy spent on playing the card, up to the Refund value.

keywords.name: Regen
keywords.description: Regen heals HP at the end of your turn. Each turn, Regen is reduced by 1.

keywords.name: Retain
keywords.description: Not discarded at the end of your turn.

keywords.name: Ritual
keywords.description: Gain Strength at the end of your turn.

keywords.name: Scry
keywords.description: Look at the top X cards of your draw pile. You may discard any of them.

keywords.name: Shiv
keywords.description: Shivs are 0 cost Attack cards which Exhaust.

keywords.name: Snecko
keywords.description: When drawn, this card randomizes its cost.

keywords.name: Soulbound
keywords.description: Cannot be removed from your deck.

keywords.name: Stance
keywords.description: You can only have one stance at a time.

keywords.name: Startup
keywords.description: Triggers at the start of each combat.

keywords.name: Status
keywords.description: Status cards are removed at the end of combat.

keywords.name: Strength
keywords.description: Strength adds additional damage to attacks.

keywords.name: Strike
keywords.description: Any card with the word "Strike" in its name.

keywords.name: Thorns
keywords.description: When receiving Attack damage, deals damage back.

keywords.name: Transform
keywords.description: Transformed cards become a random card of any rarity.

keywords.name: Unknown
keywords.description: This card has yet to be encountered.

keywords.name: Unplayable
keywords.description: Unplayable cards cannot be played from your hand.

keywords.name: Upgrade
keywords.description: Upgrading cards makes them more powerful. Cards can only be upgraded once.

keywords.name: Vigor
keywords.description: Your next Attack deals additional damage.

keywords.name: Void
keywords.description: Voids are unplayable status cards that consume energy when drawn.

keywords.name: Vulnerable
keywords.description: Vulnerable creatures take 50% more damage from Attacks.

keywords.name: Weak
keywords.description: Weakened creatures deal 25% less damage with Attacks.

keywords.name: Wound
keywords.description: Wounds are unplayable status cards.

keywords.name: Wrath
keywords.description: In this Stance, you deal and receive double attack damage.

boss.name: Ironclad 1
buff: Synchronize
Whenever Ironclad generates a Status card, a duplicate is added into your discard pile.
boss.description:
Act 1 Boss

**Synchronize** - Whenever Ironclad generates a Status card, a duplicate is added into your discard pile.

**Cards**: Bash, Flawed, Doubt, Reckless Charge, Wild Strike(+), Defend, Power Through, Second Wind, Seeing Red, Immolate, Icky, True Grit+, Thunderclap+, Feel No Pain

**Relics**: Art of War, Champion's Belt, Orichalcum (A19)

boss.name: Ironclad 2
buff: Feeding Frenzy
Ironclad's Reaper foes not Exhaust and targets ALL Mushrooms. When Ironclad kills a Mushroom, he gains 1 Strength.
customCards: Kill all Mushrooms. Heal HP equal to their remaining HP. Summon two Mushrooms.
boss.description:
Act 2 Boss

**Feeding Frenzy** - Ironclad's Reaper foes not Exhaust and targets ALL Mushrooms. When Ironclad kills a Mushroom, he gains 1 Strength.

**Cards**: Twin Strike, Feed, Clothesline, Fungus Among Us, Ghostly Armor+, Hemokinesis, Reaper, Defend, Haunted, Swift Strike, Heavy Blade, Clumsy, Bloodletting, Headbutt, Flame Barrier+, Inflame(+), Strike

**Relics**: Red Skull, Magic Flower, Vajra, Du-Vu Doll (A19)

**Unique Cards**:
Fungus Among Us - Kill all Mushrooms. Heal HP equal to their remaining HP. Summon two Mushrooms.

boss.name: Ironclad 3
buff: Bastion

Ironclad begins the fight with a Fortification, which will grant him 10 block each turn. When the Fortification has been destroyed, Ironclad loses Barricade, but gains 5 Strength at the start of each turn.
boss.description:
Act 3 Boss

**Bastion** - Ironclad begins the fight with a Fortification, which will grant him 10 block each turn. When the Fortification has been destroyed, Ironclad loses Barricade, but gains 5 Strength at the start of each turn.

**Cards**: Feel No Pain, Impervious, Intimidate, Flame Barrier(+), Body Slam, Clumsy, Entrench, Metallicize, Decay, Power Through, Second Wind, Ghostly Armor

**Relics**: Odd Mushroom, Torii, Cursed Key, Horn Cleat, Self-Forming Clay (A19)

boss.name: Silent 1
buff: Warning: Highly Toxic
Poison is blockable and deals damage at end of turn. Receive an Antidote at the start of combat.
boss.description:
Act 1 Boss

**Warning: Highly Toxic** - Poison is blockable and deals damage at end of turn. Receive an Antidote at the start of combat.

**Cards**: Crippling Cloud, Survivor, Burst, Poisoned Stab, Dodge and Roll, Strike, Bane(+), Defend, Deflect, Footwork, Noxious Fumes, Deadly Poison

**Relics**: Horn Cleat, Twisted Funnel, Lantern (A19)

**Unique Cards**:
Antidote - Lose all Poison.

boss.name: Silent 2
buff: Seeing Double
At the start of each turn, a mirror image of Silent will hide her real location. Attacking silent or the mirror removes it from combat for the turn.
boss.description:
Act 2 Boss

**Seeing Double** - At the start of each turn, a mirror image of Silent will hide her real location. Attacking silent or the mirror removes it from combat for the turn.

**Cards**: After Image+, Backstab, Doppelganger+, Nightmare, Deflect(+), J.A.X.+, Dagger Spray, Decay, Outmaneuver, Flying Knee, Blur, Footwork, Leg Sweep, Riddle with Holes

**Relics**: Paper Krane, Anchor, Bag of Marbles, Oddly Smooth Stone (A19)
